Flora Mutahi bụ onye ndekọ ego Kenya, onye ọchụnta ego na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke otu ndị na- emepụta ihe na Kenya
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Melvin Marsh International Limited onye na-emepụta Melvin's Tii, akara Kenya
Amụrụ ya na Kenya wee gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ dị na mpaghara maka agụm akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị
O nwere nzere bachelọ nke Sayensị na Akaụntụ na Ego, enwetara na Mahadum zuru ụwa ọnụ nke United States
O nwekwara Executive Master of Business Administration, nke Mahadum Cape Town na South Africa nyere ya
Na mbido, Mutahi gbaziri ego n'aka nne ya, ka o wee ruo eru maka mbinye ego ụlọ akụ
O bu ụzọ tinye aka n'ichepụta nnu
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ malitere ịzụ ahịa tii ya
Ọ malitekwara nhazi osikapa na ire ahịa
A maara ya nke ọma maka Melvin Marsh zuru ụwa niile , ụlọ ọrụ ọ tọrọ ntọala na 1995, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka CEO, kemgbe
Flora Mutahi bụ nne mụrụ ụmụ atọ
Na onwa Nọvemba 2017, a họpụtara ya osote onye isi oche nke kansụl azụmahịa nke Common Market of Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA)
Mutahi bụ onye otu ndị isi oche nke Seed Hope, onye Kenya anaghị akwụ ụgwọ na-agbalị ime ka ọnọdụ obibi ndụ nke ndị slum-ebi n'ime obodo Kibera shanty town
